name: Baxton_Studio_Psykhe_Modern_Contemporary_Beige_or_Grey_Fabric_Upholstered_Arch_Back_Sofa_Daybed_with_Roll-out_Trundle_Guest_Bed
reviews: Looks great - the texture on the fabric is beautiful and subtle but adds a high end finish. It's comfortable and was easy to put together.
description: The Psykhe Modern and Contemporary Fabric Upholstered Arched Back Sofa Daybed with Roll-out Trundle Guest Bed, as if by magic, can be transformed when required, adapting to its owner's changing needs.  Offering a number of different styling solutions, this versatile 3-in-1 furniture multi-tasks as a daybed, sofa and guest bed.  For studio apartments and condominiums where space is limited, the Psykhe could be your reading nook during the day time while transforming into your guest bed for two by rolling out the trundle. MaterialFoam, MDF, RubberwoodFinishBeige Finish, Grey FinishBed StyleDaybed, Trundle BedAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBeige, GreyFurniture PatternSolid
